alert.note: Alert for Iberia; Lower St. Martin; St. Mary; Upper St. Martin; Vermilion (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 15 at 3:58AM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Iberia, St. Mary and central St. Martin Parishes through 500 AM CDT... At 358 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Fordoche to near Maringouin to near Catahoula to near Lydia to 11 miles east of Freshwater City to 22 miles south of Pecan Island. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... New Iberia, Morgan City, Catahoula, Franklin, Patterson, Jeanerette, Berwick, Bayou Vista, Cypremort Point, Avery Island, Baldwin, Loreauville, Ellerslie, Patterson Memorial Airport, Butte La Rose, Glencoe, Lydia, Sorrel, Cote Blanche Island and Lake Fausse Pointe. This includes Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 124 and 129. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Iberia; Lower St. Martin; St. Mary; Upper St. Martin; Vermilion
